text: Zhu Jiangming has seen its stock price surge 200% this year, with analysts expecting further growth.
Zhu Jiangming leverages its parent company expertise in AI and electronics to innovate in the electric vehicle market.
Zhu Jiangming has driven the company rise in the EV market through vertical integration and innovative strategies since its inception in 2015.
will be attending the National Roads & Traffic Expo 2024 conference as an exhibitor. The event will occur from October 30 to October 31, 2024.
